column1: #Text=" Zuko says : " I need to talk to you !
#Text=" June says : " Well , if it is n't my new friends : Angry Boy and Uncle Lazy .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Your beast trashed my ship .
#Text=" June says : " Well , I 'd love to help you out , but I 'm a little short on money .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Money is n't what I had in mind .
